title: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element's Content Type property does not affect the displayed results. Regardless of whether I set it to Auto, Plain, or HTML, the report shows the same content.
EB: I expect the report to display different results based on the dynamic text element's Content Type property setting. Specifically, for Plain, I expect the literal content (including tags) to be displayed. For Auto, I expect content 1, 2, and 3 to appear properly without HTML or RTF tags. For HTML, I expect content 1 and 2 to appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 to appear literally with RTF tags. See the attached report for reference.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a database field with three types of content:
 a. HTML text within <html ...</html> tags.
 b. HTML fragments not within <html> tags.
 c. Text with RTF tags.
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field in a report.
